synopsis:
The story follows high schooler Kensei Maeshima who is swept back into the world of skating when his rival (who also led him to quit figure skating in the first place) Reo Shinozaki announces he will be competing in the team sport of skate-leading.

When Maeshima meets Hayato Sasugai, a boy who knows all about Maeshima's time as a figure skater, he's convinced to join skate-leading and take on Shinozaki again!

(Source: Funimation)

Note: Funimation and their partnering services (AnimeLab and Wakanim) premiered the anime on the 27th of December 2020 while Japanese broadcast started the 10th of January 2021.
